txt.en:
'I'll begin studying this sapper-bomb right away -- the materials used for its construction might give us a clue as to where they're being made. From what Mekhnet found out, a goblin named Thraunákh crafts these bombs. We don't know where he's located, but his sapper-bombs have spread throughout the Orc camps.

'However, if I study this bomb, I'm afraid I won't have time to pick twistbeard. I thought I'd picked enough yesterday but... our supply dwindles.

'Could you help me collect some? I usually find twistbeard on rocks in Tharkh Shathur, south-east from here. If you follow the road, you won't miss it.'
'Are you helping Lúka? Please make sure she also takes care of herself.'
'It is good Lúka is not doing this alone.'
'Who... I haven't seen you here before. But thank you.'
Lúka has asked you to collect some twistbeard.\n\nTwistbeard can be found on rocks in Tharkh Shathur, to the south-east of Ashmargathâl.
The supply of twistbeard is running low for the soldiers at Ashmargathâl. Swamped with responsibilities, Lúka finds herself asking for aid.
You should let Lúka know that you have cleaned the scouts' wounds.
'I'll make sure this twistbeard is usable; in the meantime, could you clean the wounds of a few of our injured scouts? The last thing I want is for infection and fever to sweep through our ranks.'
'Thank you. Now that I do not have to worry about our twistbeard supply, we can continue focusing on the problem of the sapper-bombs.'
Lúka has asked you to clean the wounds of injured scouts.\n\nThe scouts are resting around Ashmargathâl.
You have collected all the twistbeard you could find.\n\nYou should return to Ashmargathâl and give the twistbeard to Lúka.
